sentences.cn: ...二十世纪四十年代科学神圣化。

sentences.en: Exaltation to divine rank or stature; deification.
sentences.cn: 奉为神明; 神化的过程.

words.tran_cn: 予以神化的；神圣的；奉为神的
把…奉若神明；把…神化；崇拜

trans.tran_cn: 祀为神，奉若神明，被奉为神者
trans.tran_en: If you talk about the deification of someone or something, you mean that they are regarded with very great respect and are not criticized at all
